name: biome_exploration
description: Explores the world, capturing screenshots at various locations to analyze biome diversity

actions.prompt: Describe the terrain and biomes visible at the starting position. What types of terrain, colors, and features do you see?
Describe the terrain after moving east. Are there different biomes or terrain types visible now?
Describe the terrain in the southeast area. What biome transitions or features are visible?
Describe the terrain directly south of the starting position.
Compare this final view to the starting position. Has the terrain changed or is it the same?
